definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion

sentences.english: Whoever ignorantly creates an attachment, that stupid person comes upon suffering again and again.
sentences.chinese: 无知的蠢人执着生存因素，一再蒙受痛苦。

sentences.english: Thus the fool, as compared with the scoundrel, is invariably self-complacent.
sentences.chinese: 所以同恶棍相比，蠢人总是自鸣得意。

sentences.english: She cackled at the poor berk.
sentences.chinese: 她对可怜的蠢人喀喀笑著。

sentences.english: He gave every indication of being a fool.
sentences.chinese: 他处处显出蠢人的迹象。

sentences.english: A fool attempting to be witty is an object of profoundest pity.
sentences.chinese: 蠢人装聪明，是在最可怜。

sentences.english: The stupid and the timeservers were lucky.
sentences.chinese: 那些蠢人和混日子的人会幸运一些。

sentences.english: Jiangshan generation have a fool, who is likely to be two hundred and fifty.
sentences.chinese: 江山代有蠢人出，谁都可能二百五。

sentences.english: The foolish always do something like lifting a rock only to drop it on their own feet.
sentences.chinese: 蠢人总是做那些搬起石头砸自己的脚的事。

sentences.english: Though marriage makes man and wife one flesh, it leaves them still two fools.
sentences.chinese: 虽则结婚使夫妻合为一体，但仍旧还不过是蠢人两个。

sentences.english: Wise men seek instruction; fools fall for applause.
sentences.chinese: 聪明人找人指教，蠢人则在赞美声中跌倒。

sentences.english: We shall never again try to reason with the fool, for it is both useless and dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 我们不要再三努力同蠢人论理，因为那既无用又危险。

sentences.english: Only the foolish and the partisan have rejected (or embraced) any solutions categorically .
sentences.chinese: 只有蠢人和偏执者才绝对地拒绝或支持任何解决方案。

sentences.english: The answer is blurrier if your boss is more of an idiot that a real jerk.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的老板是像是个蠢人那么问题就越加模糊化了。

sentences.english: Don't listen that schmoe , He doesn't know what he's talking about.
sentences.chinese: 不要听那个蠢人的话，他连他自己说什么都不知道。

sentences.english: Stupid people could not have risen to the economic level that they�ve reached.
sentences.chinese: 蠢人是不可能达到他们现在所处的经济水平上的。

sentences.english: Achi:Don't waste your life following some fool's orders.
sentences.chinese: 不要浪费时间去听从一些蠢人的命令。

definition: variant of 老奸巨猾[lao3 jian1 ju4 hua2]
